name: MellonExplorer
0:
”Alexa ask mellon explorer to tell me about new york city”
”Alexa open mellon explorer”
”Alexa ask mellon explorer to tell me about dementia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mellon explorer
des: Mellon Explorer is an exploratory search system. Ask it to tell you about a broad topic, it will give you a short summary and suggested related topics for you to explore. All information provided is sourced from Wikipedia. This is a research project currently in development at Carnegie Mellon University.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
